New Records: Gerrit Cole scattered six hits and struck out four over seven innings, a notable performance in the postseason
Key Match Events: Gerrit Cole retired the first six batters and dominated throughout the game
Clay Holmes and Luke Weaver combined for a perfect eighth and ninth innings respectively
A heated exchange between players from both teams during the game
Pre-Game Insights: New York Yankees manager Aaron Boone expressed pride in the team's performance and excitement for the ALCS
Juan Soto and Gleyber Torres contributed key hits early in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge secured the final out and reflected on the team's resilience
Kansas City Royals manager Matt Quatraro highlighted the team's effort and disappointment
Miscellaneous Highlights: New York Yankees' 50-33 road record in the regular season
Kansas City Royals' remarkable turnaround from a 106-loss season
